message: I think this would be especially useful in a busy topic, or a topic another user hasn't been following, but you want them to check out a part of the chat
there is already a permalink page for a message... however, it's not easy to find. You can see some examples under Group actions -> starred messages
we should really make this easier to find for each message
i usually look for a linked date
If you star a reply, you can see it in the starred items, then can find the link

@psytek I didn't write the code. I just asked the author to make a gist and a userscript for permanent inclusion in the browser. The code has now moved to a new location: https://github.com/mal/convorenient
I asked @ericflo why the messages don't have permalinks ATM, you can find the answer/discussion here: https://convore.com/github/convore-service-hook/89237
@eik3 - well thanks for spreading the word.
